TopicTitle: Navy Missile Destroyers, Ship to Ship combat.

Articles.Content:
I expanded on the frigate that I built earlier, and designed 2 naval destroyers. Both are armed with missiles. One with 6 mid range cruise missiles, and the other with 4 mid range and 1 long range missile. They are approx. 100 meters (300ish feet) long, Kerbal crew of 11, and can do up to around 14 m/s in the water.

Once again, vanilla, all stock parts with no mods.

Played around with some ship to ship combat and it turned out much much better than I had ever expected!!!

Enjoy!! (PS: if you just want to jump to combat stuff, view vid4, or the daytime vid5)

So here is the vid in 4 parts:
